Start Your ₦600K Monthly Data Science Career Without a Tech Background

Yes, you read that right! You don’t need a degree in mathematics, statistics, or coding experience to start a high-paying career in Data Science. This training will teach you data analysis, machine learning, and automation, equipping you with skills to land remote jobs, freelance gigs, or full-time positions in top companies.

If you think Data Science is too complex or only for programmers, don’t worry—we break everything down step by step. If you’re ready to learn, this course will transform your skills in just 8 weeks!

Click Here To Get Started

Why You NEED
to Take This Course NOW!

Our Data Science Mastery Program is designed to help ANYONE—whether you’re a student, freelancer, job seeker, or aspiring tech professional—earn ₦600,000+ monthly by mastering high-demand Data Science skills that businesses and tech companies rely on.

It doesn’t matter if:

  • You have no background in coding or statistics (we’ll teach you from scratch, step by step!)
  • You don’t know how to analyze data (you’ll master Python, Excel, SQL & AI tools)
  • You’ve never worked in tech before (this is the easiest way to break in!)
  • You don’t know where to find clients or job opportunities (we’ll show you exactly where & how).
Enroll Now

Where You Can Make Money After Training:

Why This Course is Worth ₦900,000

Introduction to Data Science & Analytics

Understand what Data Science is and how it is used across industries.

Python for Data Science

Master Python programming to analyze and manipulate data.

Data Cleaning & Processing

Learn how to organize and clean messy datasets for analysis

Excel & SQL for Data Management

Learn how to use Microsoft Excel & SQL databases to store, retrieve, and analyze data.

Data Visualization with Power BI & Tableau

Present data with interactive charts and dashboards for better decision-making.

Machine Learning Basics

Get introduced to AI & predictive modeling to automate data-driven insights.

Business Intelligence & Data-Driven Decision Making

Learn how to use data to drive business growth.

Freelancing & Job Search Strategies

Discover how to start earning ₦600,000+ monthly as a Data Scientist or Analyst.

Enroll Now

who is this For?

1

Students looking to earn while studying

This training equips you with the skills to start earning online without interfering with your studies.

2

Business Owners who want to grow their sales online

If you own a business, mastering digital marketing will help you attract more customers, increase sales, and scale your business without relying on traditional marketing methods.

3

Stay-at-Home Moms/Dads who need a flexible but lucrative income source

This training teaches you how to create a profitable online business, manage social media accounts, or offer digital services—all from the comfort of your home, even if you only have a smartphone.

4

Professionals who want to quit their 9-to-5 and work on their own terms

Digital marketing opens the door to high-paying freelance opportunities, online businesses, and remote work.

Enroll Now

The Price? Practically a Giveaway

We’ve priced this course at ₦900,000 because that’s what it’s truly worth, but here’s the deal:

  • If you enroll TODAY, you’ll pay just ₦500,000!
  • Pay within 12 hours, and we’ll further slash it to ₦200,000 ONLY!

That’s a ₦700,000 discount—a small investment for the skills that can set you up for a lifetime of success. 

Offer Ends in

Days

Enroll Now

we’re here to Answer all your questions

Do I need prior coding or math experience?

No! This course is beginner-friendly and designed for people with zero coding or mathematical background. We teach everything from scratch, including Python programming, data visualization, and machine learning basics.

 

Do I need a laptop for this training?

Yes. Since this is a practical, hands-on course, you will need a laptop or desktop computer to run the data science tools and programming exercises.

What exactly will I learn in this course?

✔ How to collect, clean, and analyze large datasets.
✔ How to use Python & SQL for data manipulation and insights.
✔ How to visualize data using dashboards and charts.
✔ How to build simple machine learning models.
✔ How to make data-driven decisions in business.
✔ How to land remote jobs or freelance as a Data Scientist.

How long will it take before I can work as a Data Scientist?

This is an 8-week structured program, and by the end of the training, you’ll be able to analyze data, create reports, and apply machine learning models. However, your progress depends on how much you practice.

Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?

Yes! You will receive a recognized digital certificate that you can use to apply for Data Science jobs, freelance gigs, or internships.

don't Miss Out
